documentation.text: @dev Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.
Function to adjust the coupon

CoinRefund(address,uint256).details: Emitted when coins are refunded to the investor in case there are too many coins for the investment or to the company if they pay too much  with coupons / principal repayment

CouponAdjustment(address,uint256).details: Emmitted when coupon payment is adjusted

CouponPayment(address,uint256).details: Emitted when a coupon payment has been made

Investment(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when an investor registers initial investment request

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by a pauser (regulator).

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by a pauser (regulator).

constructor.details: constructor, requires name and symbol for the bond, base URI for metadata, company address, facevalue for one bond / min investment coupon amount, investment window closing time

issueBonds().details: Function to issue bonds for investors who have registered  Assumes all investors will get the requested investment Can be called only when investment window is closed and the contract is unpaused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.
